page.title: 10INDUSTRY/RELIGION
page.content: Castle Rock,Atlas express carriers firm,Bartholomew bindery-maps and atlasses.The many smaller units provide a variety of services and equiptment. RELIGION - Roslin church is part of a link charge.The minister is shared with Glencorse and Bilston.He takes services at Roslin and Glencorse every Sunday and about six times a year at Bilston.In 1978,Loanhead Parish church was formed from the East and West churches.The West church is now used for services and the East houses a gym club.In 1985 the minister retired.A vacancy commitee was formed to travel round listening to applicants preach before choosing one who then has to meet with the approval of the congregation.A local retired minister takes the sunday services.The are all of the church of Scotland denomination
